name: Chip 'n' Dale Rescue Rangers: The Adventure in Nimnul's Castle
name_original: Chip 'n' Dale Rescue Rangers: The Adventure in Nimnul's Castle
description:
Chip 'n' Dale Rescue Rangers: The Adventure in Nimnul's Castle is an arcade game developed by Riedel Software Productions. It came out on 01-01-1990. HiTech Expressions published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Chip 'n' Dale Rescue Rangers: The Adventure in Nimnul's Castle is available on PC.
